name: The Saving Light
description:
The Saving Light

“Sometimes I get scared by thunders. It’s not the roar, but the light that comes with it. 
In that I briefly see strange shadows dancing around my bed, too fast to understand what they are.
I’m still not used to this house, maybe this is the reason my imagination makes those scary things.
Tonight will come a storm. I hope nothing happens”

The Saving Light is an horror game telling the story of a little girl, lost at night in the house her family recently moved into. Something is not right than night: a growl coming from outside her bedroom scares her and other strange happenings makes her believe that there is someone… or something in the house.
But what can she do, if the Shadows themselves are chasing her? Light can weaken them, but not defeat.
Trapped in a nightmare where everything she knows is now twisted, like the novel “The Dark Fairy” her mother used to read her.
